extendedInfo.description: Battle it out in this exciting turn based game of strategy and risk! Play against four other enemies until you have conquered all of the cells. Whether you are looking for a quick five minute battle or a longer campaign of epic strategy, the variety of game modes and options are sure to provide you with an endless supply of challenge and fun!** UPDATE: Hit [Menu] from in-game to adjust the game speed and sound settings. **FEATURES- Randomly generated maps for a unique battle every time- Win / Loss Statistics- Multiple difficulty settings- Various starting scenarios that each provide a different style of play.- Different map sizes Purchase the full version to increase the fun!- Harder difficulty levels- More map sizes- Different starting scenarios

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Screen disappears, so can not select where to go, Asus tf700t. Uninstall immediately.
reviews.author: Kenny Burton

reviews.title: good game but too easy
reviews.comment: it works, its enjoyable but almost impossible to lose
reviews.author: Freeman Stephen

reviews.title: Nice, but... (Samsung Gal Wonder)
reviews.comment: This is a simple game yet enjoyable. I love it!   the only drawback is after playing for few hours the sound effect dissapear. But what worse is not only the game sound effect but the whole sound in my phone, means no ringtone (though my phone is not in silent mode) n i can\'t even play mp3 or wav files with my music player. I have to restart my phone to get the sound back n when i play the game it just happened again. I\'ve tried to reinstall the game but still no change. Help please, 5stars if it fixed
reviews.author: Dissa Hantra

reviews.title: Awesome game!!!
reviews.comment: Highly addicting, just plain awesome!! Bugs fixed
reviews.author: Marc Nirza

reviews.title: Simple and fun
reviews.comment: 10/10 Would play again
reviews.author: Gregory Glasscock

reviews.title: WTF?!?!?!
reviews.comment: JUST kidding. Hehehe
reviews.author: miguel alfonso orzals

reviews.title: Died after last update
reviews.comment: Great game, my favourite one, playesld it every minute of my free time. But fails to launch after last update. Please please please fix this asap
reviews.author: Natia Gvazava

reviews.title: nice... but very buggy!
reviews.comment: The game itself is an interesting take on the classic subject - nonetheless, on my current device which sports a CMX variant atm, it seems to be broken... the game plays but the screen is not redrawn. Is this a bug or something to do with e.g. the implementation of the screen? or is it the drivers my device has? other than that the game per se is nice and funny.
reviews.author: Philip Alexander Hassialis

reviews.title: Love it, but screen doesn\'t always refresh - fix for purchase please
reviews.comment: Would buy it in a heartbeat and give both apps five stars if it ran better on my Acer 501A - but it seems either slow or buggy as screen doesn\'t respond to touches for quite a while, if at all during attacks.  Also during opponents turn there is quite a lot of waiting. Would be nice to speed up turns. Gets annoying to wait, but really like game so please fix and I\'ll buy it immediately. Cheers, Fiona  ** Just gave in and bought full version as I\'m hoping it will perform better than the lite version... also I like this game so much despite its lags - have installed it on my 8 year old son\'s android and he loves it too.
reviews.author: Fiona Daniel

reviews.title: Great!!!
reviews.comment: I just love the game. Any strategy lovers out there surely don\'t miss this. Worth each byte on your mobile!

reviews.comment: It is cool

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Fun to play but the free version is just too easy to beat on every setting. I\'m sure the pay version is more fun. Uninstalled.
